note.p: Daughter of William and Ann Perkins of Shrewsbury. Died aged 9 and was buried at St Chad’s, Shrewsbury, 11 April 1826.
Shropshire, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1900 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 December 2022)
